statements: SELECT * FROM privacy_compliance_metrics;
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_status FROM privacy_compliance_metrics WHERE risk_rating > 3;
SELECT company_id, compliance_status, assessment_date FROM privacy_compliance_metrics WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
SELECT description, risk_rating FROM privacy_compliance_metrics ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT count(*) AS total_records FROM privacy_compliance_metrics WHERE risk_rating IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM privacy_compliance_metrics WHERE company_id = 100 AND regulation_name = 'GDPR' ORDER BY assessment_date DESC, risk_rating ASC;
SELECT company_id, regulation_name, compliance_status FROM privacy_compliance_metrics WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant' AND risk_rating >= 3;
SELECT company_id, regulation_name, compliance_status, risk_rating FROM privacy_compliance_metrics WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY risk_rating DESC;
SELECT regulation_name, COUNT(*) AS Total_Count FROM privacy_compliance_metrics GROUP BY regulation_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT company_id, regulation_name, compliance_status, risk_rating, description FROM privacy_compliance_metrics WHERE description IS NOT NULL AND description <> '' ORDER BY company_id ASC;
SELECT organization_id, regulation_name, compliance_score, last_audit_date FROM privacy_metrics;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT organization_id, AVG(compliance_score) AS avg_score FROM privacy_metrics GROUP BY organization_id;
SELECT DISTINCT regulation_name FROM privacy_metrics;
SELECT organization_id, count(log_id) AS log_count FROM audit_logs GROUP BY organization_id HAVING log_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM privacy_metrics WHERE organization_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT organization_id, regulation_name, compliance_score FROM privacy_metrics ORDER BY compliance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT organization_id, action_taken FROM audit_logs WHERE action_taken LIKE '%update%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(compliance_score) AS average_score, regulation_name FROM privacy_metrics GROUP BY regulation_name;
SELECT * FROM privacy_metrics;
SELECT company_name, total_records FROM privacy_metrics WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT company_name, regulation_type, data_type FROM privacy_metrics ORDER BY regulation_type ASC, company_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_issues WHERE resolved = FALSE;
SELECT company_name, MAX(total_records) AS max_records FROM privacy_metrics GROUP BY company_name;
SELECT * FROM privacy_metrics ORDER BY company_name DESC, regulation_type ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_name, regulation_type, data_type FROM privacy_metrics WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
SELECT company_name, regulation_type, COUNT(*) AS total_issues FROM compliance_issues GROUP BY company_name, regulation_type HAVING total_issues > 2;
SELECT company_name, regulation_type, MAX(total_records) AS max_records FROM privacy_metrics GROUP BY company_name, regulation_type;
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulation_compliance_metrics;
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_status FROM regulation_compliance_metrics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT subject_name, email FROM data_subjects WHERE phone_number = '+1234567890';
SELECT * FROM data_processes ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT log_date, action_taken, remarks FROM compliance_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM regulation_compliance_metrics WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_status FROM regulation_compliance_metrics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM data_subjects WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT id, subject_name FROM data_subjects WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT process_name, department, responsible_person FROM data_processes WHERE department = 'Marketing' AND responsible_person = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM organization_details;
SELECT organization_name, industry FROM organization_details WHERE organization_id = 1;
SELECT regulation_name, regulatory_body FROM data_protection_regulations ORDER BY compliance_deadline ASC;
SELECT issue_description, resolution_status FROM compliance_issues WHERE organization_id = 2;
SELECT organization_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM organization_details WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT * FROM organization_details WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT organization_name, contact_email FROM organization_details WHERE contact_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT organization_name, industry, contact_email FROM organization_details ORDER BY industry, organization_name DESC;
SELECT data_type, AVG(data_protection_score) AS avg_score FROM privacy_compliance_metrics GROUP BY data_type HAVING AVG(data_protection_score) > 75;

SELECT organization_name, issue_description, resolution_status FROM organization_details JOIN compliance_issues ON organization_details.organization_id = compliance_issues.organization_id WHERE resolution_status = 'Pending';
